channel.title: Problem With Client (Help Greatly Appreciated)
channel.description:
Hello, I am using the Forgotten Scape Client (from http://www.forgottenparadise.co.nr/ >Client Download) and every time I try to run it I get this message:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bot Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Bot at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Bot. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Problem With Client (Help Greatly Appreciated)
item.dc:creator: @Sir_roju Sir roju
item.description:
@Sir_roju wrote:

you do not have bot.java or you arent compiled it… I think your client use bot.java as jframe for your client… try compile your client

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Problem With Client (Help Greatly Appreciated)

item.description:
@beastman wrote:

Hello, I am using the Forgotten Scape Client (from http://www.forgottenparadise.co.nr/ >Client Download) and every time I try to run it I get this message:

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Bot
